Description.Name: Capture
Description.Details: Sumire pulls you aside as the MechWarriors debark. "I have the transmission from the Directorate ready, Commander. Lady Espinosa sent us a video of what they did to Alexander. Nothing of value in there, and it will just upset Lady Arano more. We should delete it."

Description.Name: We'll do her no favors hiding what she already knows.
Capture
Description.Details: Farah works as quickly as she can to unpack the archive while a distraught Kamea composes herself for the debriefing.
